definitions: relating to or involving the selection of the most suitable or best qualified

examples.text: the mini-cow is the result of generations of selective breeding

shortDefinitions: relating to or involving selection of most suitable or best qualified

definitions: (of a person) tending to choose carefully

examples.text: he is very selective in his reading

definitions: (of a process or agent) affecting some things and not others

examples.text: modern pesticides are more selective in effect

shortDefinitions: affecting some things and not others

definitions: operating at or responding to a particular frequency

examples.text: a new marine VHF radio with digital selective calling

shortDefinitions: operating at or responding to particular frequency
